biography.biography: Alexander Alekseevich Alekseev - Belarusian photographer, publisher, designer, journalist, director, candidate of economic sciences

biographyList: 2000 - Graduated from management faculity of Belarus State Economic University
2000 - Awarded a medal by Ministry of education and science of Russian Federation "For best scientific work" among junior scientists at the result of all-russian competition
2001 - Started to work at belarussian television
2001 - Accredited as a Belarusian photographer and journalist at international film festivals in Cannes, Berlin and Venice
2003 - In collaboration with Oleg Lukashevich creates the art project "Nasledije Belarusi" ("Heritage of Belarus")
07.01.2005 - Became the Laureate of the Prize of the President of the Republic of Belarus "For spiritual revival"
2012 - Works in Belarussian documentary as a director
2014 - Graduated from Belarusian State Academy of Arts with a degree in film director

content.value: Books-albums of the art project “Heritage of Belarus”

Second director
Documentary and educational cycle "Artists of the Paris School. Natives of Belarus ", consisting of 9 documentaries. The cycle is part of Belgazprombank cultural project “Art Belarus”. The duration of each film is 26 minutes. The films are created for the development of international cultural cooperation between France and the Republic of Belarus.
